item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Helix: A Vision-Language-Action Model for Generalist Humanoid Control (166 points | 96 comments)
2. Spice86 – A PC emulator for real mode reverse engineering (84 points | 15 comments)
3. Launch HN: Confident AI (YC W25) – Open-source evaluation framework for LLM apps (43 points | 2 comments)
4. After 20 Years, Math Couple Solves Major Group Theory Problem (294 points | 78 comments)
5. Show HN: WinCse – Integrating AWS S3 with Windows Explorer (24 points | 6 comments)
6. Lox – Oxidized Astrodynamics – A safe, ergonomic astrodynamics library (61 points | 14 comments)
7. DotSlash: Simplified Executable Deployment (20 points | 9 comments)
8. RT64: N64 graphics renderer in emulators and native ports (74 points | 22 comments)
9. Do ambiguous images provide psychological insights? Testing a popular claim (13 points | 8 comments)
10. When imperfect systems are good: Bluesky's lossy timelines (729 points | 283 comments)
11. 1972 Unix V2 "Beta" Resurrected (374 points | 102 comments)
12. iText PDF Library turns 25 (38 points | 15 comments)
13. Customizable HTML Select (57 points | 28 comments)
14. A cryptocurrency scam that turned a small town against itself (112 points | 74 comments)
15. Softmax forever, or why I like softmax (157 points | 74 comments)
16. FAQ on Microsoft's topological qubit thing (265 points | 53 comments)
17. Show HN: EVMole for Analysing EVM Bytecode (5 points | discuss)
18. Egg prices are soaring. Are backyard chickens the answer? (244 points | 660 comments)
19. All-optical control of charge-trapping defects in rare-earth doped oxides (24 points | 2 comments)
20. Animate Anyone 2: High-Fidelity Character Image Animation (127 points | 36 comments)
21. AI killed the tech interview. Now what? (165 points | 374 comments)
22. The 8-Bit Era's Weird Uncle: The TI-99/4A (147 points | 92 comments)
23. DOGE has 'god mode' access to government data (673 points | 1253 comments)
24. The most underreported story in AI is that scaling has failed to produce AGI (33 points | 31 comments)
25. The Amazon Appstore for Android devices will be discontinued on August 20, 2025 (179 points | 149 comments)
26. The Forecasting Company (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
27. F8 – an 8 bit architecture designed for C and memory efficiency [video] (62 points | 35 comments)
28. Obsidian is now free for work (166 points | 7 comments)
29. Broken legs and ankles heal better if you walk on them within weeks (562 points | 313 comments)
30. Relaxed Radix Balanced Trees (2024) (173 points | 15 comments)
